discourse_list.title: Allow ERC interfaces in the EIP repository

content.content: I argue that interfaces for ERCs should be allowed to store in the EIP repository. Discussion here https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/903#issuecomment-378472561 Please see the discussion there if you are interested.
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is proposing that interfaces for ERCs should be allowed to be stored in the EIP repository. The post includes a link to a discussion on GitHub for those interested. The post receives constructive criticism and questions from third parties, but no advertising or collaboration requests are made.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
